text: The 2019 Boels Rental Ladies Tour also known as the 2019 Holland Ladies Tour is the 22nd edition of the Holland Ladies Tour, a women's cycle stage race held in the Netherlands. The tour was part of the 2019 women's road cycling calendar and was part of the UCI Women's World Tour. It ran from 3 to 8 September 2019. ==Stages== {| class=wikitable |+List of stages |- !Stage !Date !Course !Distance !colspan=2|Type !Winner |- !align=center|P |align=center| 3 September | Sittard to Sittard |align=center| | 20px | Prologue | |- !align=center| 1 |align=center| 4 September | Stramproy to Weert |align=center| |align=center| alt= | Flat stage | |- !align=center|2 |align=center| 5 September | Gennep to Gennep |align=center| |align=center| alt= | Flat stage | |- !align=center|3 |align=center| 6 September | Nijverdal to Nijverdal |align=center| |align=center| alt= | Flat stage | |- !align=center|4 |align=center| 7 September | Arnhem to Nijmegen |align=center| |align=center| alt= | Flat stage | |- !align=center|5 |align=center| 8 September | Nijmegen to Arnhem |align=center| |align=center| alt= | Flat stage | |- !colspan=3| Total !colspan=5| |} ==Teams== Sixteen professional women's teams and one national team entered the race.
